digital_wallet_token_id.description: The identifier of the Digital Wallet Token.

$block: A Digital Wallet Token is created when a user adds a Card to their Apple Pay or Google Pay app. The Digital Wallet Token can be used for purchases just like a Card.

$ul: **card_id**: The identifier for the Card this Digital Wallet Token belongs to.
**created_at**: The [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) date and time at which the Card was created.
**status**: This indicates if payments can be made with the Digital Wallet Token.
**token_requestor**: The digital wallet app being used.
**type**: A constant representing the object's type. For this resource it will always be `digital_wallet_token`.
